
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiaoyan2017/p/19018641" title="发布于 2025-08-02 11:38">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">Flutter3-MacOS桌面OS系统|flutter3.32+window_manager客户端OS模板</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><span style="font-size: 18px; font-family: 宋体, &quot;Songti SC&quot;; color: rgba(119, 63, 192, 1)">原创<span style="background-color: rgba(204, 255, 255, 1)">flutter3.32+dart3.8+window_manager</span><strong>桌面OS</strong>解决方案<em>Flutter3MacOS</em>。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px"><strong>flutter3_macos</strong>最新研发<span style="background-color: rgba(255, 255, 153, 1); color: rgba(255, 102, 0, 1)">flutter3.32+dart3.8+getx+window_manager+reorderables</span>客户端os管理系统模板。支持<strong>macOS</strong>和<strong>windows</strong>两种桌面布局风格、<span style="background-color: rgba(244, 222, 246, 1)">毛玻璃虚化背景、桌面栅格布局模板、Dock菜单可拖拽排序、自定义JSON配置桌面/dock菜单</span>。</span></p>
<p><img alt="未标题-1" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802104100680-1105289401.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<h3>技术栈</h3>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">编辑器：VScode</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">框架技术：Flutter3.32+Dart3.8</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">窗口管理：window_manager^0.5.1</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">路由/状态管理：get^4.7.2</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">缓存服务：get_storage^2.1.1</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">拖拽排序：reorderables^0.6.0</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">图表组件：fl_chart^1.0.0</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">托盘管理：system_tray^2.0.3</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">日历插件：syncfusion_flutter_calendar^30.1.42</span></li>
</ul>
<p><img alt="p1" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802104239437-511493512.gif" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="p3" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802104515098-450782662.gif" class="lazyload"></p>
<h3>项目特性</h3>
<ol>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">支持macos/windows两种桌面风格</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">经典程序坞Dock菜单(可拖拽排序/二级菜单)</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">支持自定义json配置桌面菜单和Dock菜单</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">自研桌面栅格化布局模板</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">自定义桌面个性化壁纸、全场景毛玻璃虚化UI质感</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">支持自定义弹窗加载页面组件(支持全屏/拖拽/缩放)</span></li>
</ol>
<p><img alt="p4-1" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802105039908-1976885948.gif" class="lazyload"></p>
<h3>项目结构目录</h3>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">flutter-macos使用最新版跨平台框架&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code">flutter3.32+dart3.8</span>&nbsp;搭建项目模板。</span></p>
<p><img alt="360截图20250802105559397" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802105618699-837207452.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="003360截图20250801214536046" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802105725430-888897857.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<blockquote>
<h3><em>flutter3-macOS已经同步到我的原创作品集，有需要的可以去下载使用。</em></h3>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px"><a href="https://mall.bilibili.com/neul-next/detailuniversal/detail.html?isMerchant=1&amp;page=detailuniversal_detail&amp;saleType=10&amp;itemsId=12852260&amp;loadingShow=1&amp;noTitleBar=1&amp;msource=merchant_share" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">flutter3.32+window_manager桌面端OS管理系统</a></span></p>
</blockquote>
<h3>项目入口文件main.dart</h3>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>import 'dart:io'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
import </span>'package:flutter/material.dart'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
import </span>'package:get/get.dart'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
import </span>'package:get_storage/get_storage.dart'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
import </span>'package:intl/date_symbol_data_local.dart'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
import </span>'package:system_tray/system_tray.dart'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
import </span>'package:window_manager/window_manager.dart'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;

import </span>'utils/common.dart'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 引入布局模板</span>
import 'layouts/desktop.dart'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 引入路由管理</span>
import 'router/index.dart'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">void</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> main() async {
  </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 初始化国际化语言</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">  initializeDateFormatting();

  </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 初始化get_storage本地存储</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">  await GetStorage.init();

  </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 初始化window_manager窗口</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">  WidgetsFlutterBinding.ensureInitialized();
  await windowManager.ensureInitialized();
  WindowOptions windowOptions </span>=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> const WindowOptions(
    title: </span>'Flutter-MacOS'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    size: Size(</span>1000, 640<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),
    center: </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    backgroundColor: Colors.transparent,
    skipTaskbar: </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">false</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    titleBarStyle: TitleBarStyle.hidden, </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 是否隐藏系统导航栏</span>
    windowButtonVisibility: <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">false</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  );
  windowManager.waitUntilReadyToShow(windowOptions, () async {
    windowManager.setAsFrameless(); </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 无边框</span>
    windowManager.setHasShadow(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span>); <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 是否有阴影</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    await windowManager.show();
    await windowManager.focus();
  });

  await initSystemTray();

  runApp(const MyApp());
}

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 初始化系统托盘图标</span>
Future&lt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">void</span>&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> initSystemTray() async {
  String trayIco </span>= 'assets/images/tray.ico'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
  SystemTray systemTray </span>=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> SystemTray();

  </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 初始化系统托盘</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">  await systemTray.initSystemTray(
    title: </span>'Flutter-MacOS'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    iconPath: trayIco,
  );

  </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 右键菜单</span>
  final Menu menu =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Menu();
  await menu.buildFrom([
    MenuItemLabel(label: </span>'打开主界面', image: 'assets/images/tray_main.bmp', onClicked: (menuItem) async =&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> await windowManager.show()),
    MenuItemLabel(label: </span>'隐藏窗口', image: 'assets/images/tray_hide.bmp', onClicked: (menuItem) async =&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> await windowManager.hide()),
    MenuItemLabel(label: </span>'设置中心', image: 'assets/images/tray_setting.bmp', onClicked: (menuItem) =&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> {}),
    MenuItemLabel(label: </span>'锁屏', image: 'assets/images/tray_lock.bmp', onClicked: (menuItem) =&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> {}),
    MenuItemLabel(label: </span>'退出', image: 'assets/images/tray_logout.bmp', onClicked: (menuItem) async =&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> await windowManager.destroy()),
  ]);
  await systemTray.setContextMenu(menu);

  </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 右键事件</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">  systemTray.registerSystemTrayEventHandler((eventName) async {
    debugPrint(</span>'eventName: $eventName'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (eventName ==<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> kSystemTrayEventClick) {
      Platform.isWindows </span>?<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> await windowManager.show() : systemTray.popUpContextMenu();
    } </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">else</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (eventName ==<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> kSystemTrayEventRightClick) {
      Platform.isWindows </span>?<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> systemTray.popUpContextMenu() : await windowManager.show();
    }
  });
}

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  const MyApp({super.key});

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> GetMaterialApp(
      title: </span>'FLUTTER3 MACOS'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
      debugShowCheckedModeBanner: </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">false</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
      </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 配置主题</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">      theme: ThemeData(
        colorScheme: ColorScheme.fromSeed(seedColor: Colors.indigo),
        useMaterial3: </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
        </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 修复windows端字体粗细不一致</span>
        fontFamily: Platform.isWindows ? 'Microsoft YaHei' : <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">null</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
      ),
      home: const Desktop(),
      </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 初始路由</span>
      initialRoute: Common.isLogin() ? '/' : '/login'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
      </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 路由页面</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">      getPages: routePages,
    );
  }
}</span></pre>
</div>
<p><img alt="未标题-3-1" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802110228240-1425919959.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="007360截图20250801223052965" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802110258226-70781750.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<h3>flutter-macos桌面布局模板</h3>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">项目内置了macos+windows两种风格桌面布局模板。</span></p>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802110446723-64355673.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802110550277-1833385928.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Scaffold(
  key: scaffoldKey,
  body: Obx(() {
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Container(
      </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 背景图主题</span>
      decoration: skinController.skinUrl.isNotEmpty ?<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> BoxDecoration(
        image: DecorationImage(
          image: AssetImage(</span>'${skinController.skinUrl}'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),
          fit: BoxFit.cover,
        ),
      )
      :
      </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 默认渐变色</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">      BoxDecoration(
        gradient: LinearGradient(
          begin: Alignment.topLeft,
          end: Alignment.bottomRight,
          colors: [Color(</span>0xFF454ED4), Color(0xFFBC40D4<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)],
        ),
      ),
      child: DragToResizeArea(
        child: Flex(
          direction: Axis.vertical,
          crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
          children: [
            </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 顶部模块</span>
            widget.header ??<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> WindowTitlebar(
              onDrawer: () {
                scaffoldKey.currentState</span>?<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">.openEndDrawer();
              },
            ),

            </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 桌面模块</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            Expanded(
              child: widget.body </span>??<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Container(),
            ),

            </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 底部模块</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            Container(
              child: widget.footer,
            ),
          ],
        ),
      ),
    );
  }),
);</span></pre>
</div>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802111121203-158849839.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802111235377-442368022.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><strong>桌面布局模板</strong></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>class _DesktopState extends State&lt;Desktop&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> {
  SettingController settingController </span>=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Get.put(SettingController());

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Obx(() {
      final layout </span>= settingController.settingData['dock'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">];
      </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Layout(
        </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 桌面菜单</span>
        body: layout == 'macos' ?<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> MacDesktop() : WindowDesktop(),
        </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 底部导航</span>
        footer: layout == 'macos' ?<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> MacDock() : WindowDock(),
      );
    });
  }
}</span></pre>
</div>

<p><img alt="004360截图20250801215231784" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802111512824-2063894709.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="005360截图20250801220034385" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802111555885-488661563.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="007360截图20250801222947313" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802111615737-641809565.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="007360截图20250801223052961" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802111636486-743877104.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="007360截图20250801224104515" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802111652025-14550322.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="004360截图20250801214826609" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802111732555-2039317379.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802111833483-1246140992.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><strong>桌面菜单JSON配置参数</strong></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">/*</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">*
  * ================== 桌面OS菜单配置 ==================
  * [label]  图标标题
  * [imgico] 图标(本地或网络图片) 支持Icon图标、自定义组件、svg/png...类型
  * [path]   跳转路由页面
  * [link]   跳转外部链接
  * [hideLabel]  是否隐藏图标标题
  * [background] 自定义图标背景色
  * [size] 栅格磁贴布局(1x1 ... 12x12)
  * [onClick]  点击图标回调函数
  * children 二级菜单
  </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">*/</span></pre>
</div>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802112114359-1433532331.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802112132359-2037577445.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><strong>桌面菜单JSON配置片段</strong></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>late List deskMenus =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> [
  {
    </span>'uid': '6c84fb90-12c4-11e1-840d-7b25c5ee775a'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span>'label': '主页'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span>'list'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: [
      {</span>'label': '今日', 'imgico': const Today(), 'hideLabel': <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span>, 'size': '3x2'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
      {</span>'label': '日历', 'imgico': const Calendar2x2(), 'size': '2x2'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
      {
        </span>'label': '便签', 'imgico': const Notebook(), 'size': '3x2'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
        </span>'onClick': () =&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> {
          navigator</span>?<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">.push(FdialogRoute(
            child: Fdialog(
              title: Text(</span>'便签'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),
              content: Center(
                child: Column(
                  mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
                  children: [
                    Icon(Icons.turned_in_not_rounded, color: Colors.black26, size: </span>40.0<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,),
                    Text(</span>'自定义便签'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, style: TextStyle(color: Colors.black38),)
                  ],
                )
              ),
              width: </span>375<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
              height: </span>400<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
              maximizable: </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
              resizeable: </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
            ),
          ))
        }
      },
      {</span>'label': '备忘录', 'imgico': const Note(), 'size': '2x2'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
      {</span>'label': '倒计时', 'imgico': const Countdown(), 'size': '2x2'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},

      </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> ...</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    ]
  },
  </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> ...</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">  {
    </span>'uid': '9a16fb90-12c4-11e1-840d-7b25c5ee775a'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span>'label': '摸鱼'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span>'list'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: [
      {</span>'label': 'Flutter3.32', 'imgico': 'assets/images/logo.png', 'link': 'https://flutter.dev/', 'background': Color(0xFFEAFAFF), 'size': '2x2'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
      {</span>'label': 'Github', 'imgico': 'assets/images/svg/github.svg', 'link': 'https://github.com/', 'background': Color(0xff607d8b<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),},
      {</span>'label': '掘金', 'imgico': 'assets/images/svg/juejin.svg', 'link': 'https://juejin.cn/', 'background': Color(0xff0984fe), 'size': '1x2'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
      {</span>'label': '哔哩哔哩', 'imgico': 'assets/images/svg/bilibili.svg', 'link': 'https://www.bilibili.com/', 'background': Color(0xfffe65a6), 'size': '3x2'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
      </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> ...</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    ]
  },
  {
    </span>'uid': 'u738f210-807e-1e4e-1550-4deefac27e48'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span>'label': 'AI'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span>'list'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: [
      {</span>'label': 'DeepSeek', 'imgico': 'https://www.faxianai.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/20250205134524-1febd.png', 'link': 'https://chat.deepseek.com/', 'hideLabel': <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span>, 'background': Color(0xffffffff), 'size': '3x2'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
      {</span>'label': '腾讯元宝', 'imgico': 'https://www.faxianai.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/20250224143149-7fe1f.png', 'link': 'https://yuanbao.tencent.com/', 'background': Color(0xffffffff), 'size': '2x2'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},

  },
  {
    </span>'uid': '3u85fb90-12c4-11e1-840d-7b25c5ee775a'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,

          {</span>'label': 'DeepSeek深度求索', 'imgico': 'https://www.faxianai.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/20250205134524-1febd.png', 'link': 'https://chat.deepseek.com/', 'background': Color(0xffffffff), 'size': '2x1'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},

      {

<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        }
      },
      {
        </span>'label': '公众号', 'imgico'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: const Icon(Icons.qr_code),
        </span>'onClick': () =&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> {
          </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> ...</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        }
      },
    ]
  }
];</span></pre>
</div>
<h3>桌面Dock菜单</h3>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802112714984-220951940.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250802112753015-2138655897.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><strong>桌面Dock菜单配置参数</strong></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">/*</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">*
  * ================== 桌面dock菜单配置项 ==================
  * [label]  图标标题
  * [imgico] 图标(本地或网络图片) 支持Icon图标、自定义组件、svg/png...类型
  * [path]   跳转路由页面
  * [link]   跳转外部链接
  * [active] 激活圆点
  * [onClick]  点击图标回调函数
  * children 二级菜单
  </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">*/</span></pre>
</div>
<p>以上就是flutter3.32搭建跨平台仿macOS+windows桌面端os系统的一些知识分享，希望对大家有所帮助！</p>
<p><strong>附上几个最新项目实例</strong></p>
<blockquote>
